page.title: 11Transport_Coaches
page.content: {Staff.}Primrose Valley Coach Co. has 20 staff,11 drivers and 9 office workers.The drivers have a bus or coach of their own to drive.They have to clean and wash their vehicle every week.The office workers are 2 secretaries and a manager who is called Mr.Webster he has been working there for 10 years .The company is quite a small one. {Vehicles.}The coaches and buses are mostly are mostly 53 seaters made by Ford and Bedford.The coaches can hold 50 gallons of diesel fuel in thie tanks.The buses were built in the 1970's and they are now worth about Â£10:000.They have 12 coaches and 3 buses,coloured red and white. {Destinations.}The destinations they go to include France,Holland,London and Glasgow.They provide transport for a no. of different schools in the area.
